attributes.action: Take All Golf Courses In The UK And Change Them Into Houses For The Homeless
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 1000's of people today are living in the streets while a small percentage of elitist's get to play a pointless "sport" on ACRE's and ACRE's of land which could be put to much better use, to house the homeless.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
